title: Vortex
description: Vortex is a performance-based 3D animation toolkit for mobile video creators. It allows users to create and share 3D animated videos by composing a set of performances on characters, cameras or props in space and time. In addition to performing object motion via touch-screen input, Vortex allows you to use your mobile device's AR tracking to animate. Inspired by Mandalorian-style virtual production, Figma, multitrack recorders and music/video editors, Vortex aims to make CGI accessible to any creator to explore creative ideas.
